reviews.review_msg: CRIM 437 + 436. VERY good at making us critical thinkers and receptive to student feedback.  I was intimated by her and she seems cold at first but she actually cares a lot about her students and is a fair marker. First seminars I ever took and I'm glad it was with her. Presentation + 4800 papers were killer but no exams for her seminars.

She is an awesome prof. super intimidating the first class but she warms up, and as long as you put effort she will give u a good grade! I WAS SHOCKED this class was suppose to be my challenging class for the semester but ended up being easier than expected! she treats you like an adult, no babying u around!
